name: terminal-macros
description: Do anything with the terminal without needing to touch the terminal.

terminalMacros.default.save.description: Whether to save the current file before inserting the command.

terminalMacros.default.stop.description: Whether to hit ctrl-d before inserting the command.

terminalMacros.default.logout.description: Whether to hit ctrl-c before inserting the command.

terminalMacros.default.clear.description: Whether to clear the screen before inserting the command.

terminalMacros.default.execute.description: Whether to run the command immediately.

terminalMacros.default.focus.description: Whether to focus on the terminal after inserting the command.

group.description: Commands sharing the group name will be grouped together in the menu.

name.description: Name for the command. A human readable string which is rendered prominent.

command.description: The command to send to the terminal. Variables: {recent}, {file}, {paste}

save.description: Whether to save the current file before inserting the command.

stop.description: Whether to hit ctrl-c before inserting the command.

logout.description: Whether to hit ctrl-d before inserting the command.

clear.description: Whether to clear the screen before inserting the command.

execute.description: Whether to run the command immediately.

focus.description: Whether to focus on the terminal after inserting the command.
